symbols.name: module:sap/ui/rta/api/startAdaptation
symbols.description: Starts UI adaptation, initiated for an application at the passed root control instance. With this API you are also able to modify the UI adaptation plugins list and or add some event handler functions to be called on start, failed and stop events.

returnValue.description: Resolves when UI adaptation was successfully started

parameters.name: mOptions

rootControl.name: rootControl
rootControl.description: Control instance from where UI adaptation should be started

layer.name: layer
layer.description: The Layer in which RTA should be started. Default: "CUSTOMER"

developerMode.name: developerMode
developerMode.description: Whether RTA is started in developerMode mode. Default: false

parameters.description: Object with properties

parameters.name: loadPlugins
parameters.description: Callback function that enables the modification of the default plugin list of UI adaptation. UI adaptation is passed to this function

parameters.name: onStart
parameters.description: Event handler function called on start event

parameters.name: onFailed
parameters.description: Event handler function called on failed event

parameters.name: onStop
parameters.description: Event handler function called on stop event

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/rta/api/startKeyUserAdaptation
symbols.description: Starts key user adaptation, initiated for an application at the passed root control instance. It subsequently extends to all valid child controls.

returnValue.description: Resolves when adaptation was successfully started

parameters.name: mPropertyBag

rootControl.name: rootControl
rootControl.description: Control instance from where key user adaptation should be started

parameters.description: Object with properties

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.Client
symbols.description:
Overview

This client is used to access the sap.ui.RuntimeAuthoring instance that is running in a separate window.

Example:

sap.ui.require(['sap/ui/rta/Client'], function (RTAClient) {
    var oRTAClient = new RTAClient({
        window: ,
        origin: 
    });

    oRTAClient.getService('selection').then(function (oSelectionService) {
        oSelectionService.add('__button0').then(
            function (vResult) {
                // vResult contains response from add() function of sap.ui.rta.service.Selection
            },
            function (vError) {
                // Error that happens during the operation
            }
        );
    });
});

properties.name: window
properties.description: Receiving window object; has to be a different window than the window in which this client is used

properties.name: origin
properties.description: Receiving window origin; a valid origin has to be specified, see {@link https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/origin.html#origin}

constructor.description: Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Destroys the client. After an object has been destroyed, it can no longer be used.

methods.name: extend

returnValue.description: Created class / constructor function

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class

methods.description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.rta.Client with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject.extend}.

methods.name: getMetadata

returnValue.description: Metadata object describing this class

methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.rta.Client.

methods.name: getOrigin

returnValue.description: Value of property origin

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getOrigin origin}.

Receiving window origin; a valid origin has to be specified, see {@link https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/origin.html#origin}

methods.name: getWindow

returnValue.description: Value of property window

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getWindow window}.

Receiving window object; has to be a different window than the window in which this client is used

methods.name: setOrigin

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: sOrigin
parameters.description: New value for property origin

methods.name: setWindow

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oWindow
parameters.description: New value for property window

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getWindow window}. Receiving window object; has to be a different window than the window in which this client is used When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.enablement.TestDelegate
symbols.description: sap.ui.fl Delegate to be used in elementActionTests.

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Action
symbols.description: Provides necessary functionality to get and execute actions on controls. Actions are UI operations available in key user adaptation such as rename, remove, move etc.

methods.name: execute

returnValue.description: Result of the operation wrapped in a promise.

parameters.name: vControlIds
parameters.description: Control ID or an array of IDs to get actions for

parameters.name: sActionId
parameters.description: Action ID to be executed on the specified controls

methods.description: Returns a list of available actions for the specified control(s).

methods.name: get

returnValue.description: List of available actions wrapped in a promise

parameters.name: vControlIds
parameters.description: Control ID or an array of IDs to get actions for

methods.description:
Returns a list of available actions for the specified control(s) wrapped in a promise. Example: 
[
    {
        "id": "CTX_RENAME",
        "text": "Rename",
        "enabled": false,
        "rank": 10,
        "icon": "sap-icon://edit"
    },
    {
        "id": "CTX_ADD_ELEMENTS_AS_SIBLING",
        "text": "Add Field",
        "enabled": false,
        "rank": 20,
        "icon": "sap-icon://add",
        "group": "Add"
    },
    {
        "id": "CTX_REMOVE",
        "text": "Remove",
        "enabled": true,
        "rank": 60,
        "icon": "sap-icon://decline"
    },
    {
        "id": "CTX_CUT",
        "text": "Cut",
        "enabled": false,
        "rank": 70,
        "icon": "sap-icon://scissors"
    },
    {
        "id": "CTX_PASTE",
        "text": "Paste",
        "enabled": false,
        "rank": 80,
        "icon": "sap-icon://paste"
    }
]

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Action.ActionObject
symbols.description:
Object containing the detailed information about the action. 
{
   id: <string>, // ID of the action
   group: <string>, // Group name, in case the action has been grouped with other action(s)
   icon: <string>, // Icon name
   enabled: <boolean>, // Indicates whether the action is active and can be executed
   rank: <int>, // Sorting rank for visual representation of the action position
   text: <string>, // Action name
}

properties.name: id
properties.description: ID of the action

properties.name: group
properties.description: Group name in case the action has been grouped with other action(s)

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Icon name

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Indicates whether the action is active and can be executed

properties.name: rank
properties.description: Sorting rank for visual representation of the action position

properties.name: text
properties.description: Action name

methods.name: add

returnValue.description: Definition of the newly created change

parameters.name: sCodeRef
parameters.description: Name of the file, without path, with the extension .js. Must comply to UI5 module naming convention. Has to be unique and must not conflict with other already defined modules.

parameters.name: sViewId
parameters.description: ID of the view whose controller should be extended

methods.description: Creates a change that adds an extension to the controller associated with the given view. Throws an error if the information is not complete. As of now, this only creates the change with a reference to a file. The consumer has to take care of creating that file and adding it to the backend.

methods.name: getTemplate

returnValue.description: Promise that resolves with the template as string or rejects when the file was not found

parameters.name: sViewId
parameters.description: ID of the view whose template should be retrieved

methods.description: Gets the controller extension template from the DesignTimeMetadata of the given view and returns it as a string wrapped in a promise. If there is no template specified, a default template will be returned.

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Outline
symbols.description: Provides necessary functionality to get tree model data for an outline. Takes into consideration different design time root elements.

events.name: update

methods.name: get

returnValue.description: Array containing outline data for each root control

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: ID of the control to start with. If omitted the root control(s) is used.

parameters.name: iDepth
parameters.description: Depth of childNode levels that should be returned based on the given control

methods.description: Returns an outline model data associated with the key user adaptation instance, starting from the passed control. If no control is passed, the root control(s) of the respective key user adaptation instance is taken as the initial control. Throws an error if the control ID parameter is not a valid control with a stable ID.

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Outline.ExtensionPointInfo
symbols.description: Object containing an outline of available nodes.

properties.name: defaultContent
properties.description: List of control IDs that belong to the default content of an extension point

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Outline.OutlineObject
symbols.description: Object containing an outline of available nodes.

properties.name: id
properties.description: ID of the control

properties.name: instanceName
properties.description: Text retrieved from node's design time metadata getLabel()

properties.name: name
properties.description: Singular name from node's design time metadata

properties.name: technicalName
properties.description: Class type for element nodes/aggregation name for aggregation nodes.

properties.name: editable
properties.description: Indicates whether the node is editable

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Icon path for the node

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of node

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Visibility of node of type element

properties.name: extensionPointInfo
properties.description: In case of an extension point additional extension point information is given.

properties.name: elements
properties.description: Outline data for child nodes

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Property
symbols.description: Provides necessary functionality to retrieve design time metadata properties. Takes into consideration control metadata properties, design time metadata properties, annotations, label and name.

methods.name: get

returnValue.description: Object containing relevant property data for the passed control

parameters.name: sControlId
parameters.description: ID of the control to start with

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Property.PropertyObject
symbols.description: Object containing the detailed information about design time properties of the passed control.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name object from design time metadata

properties.name: properties
properties.description: Properties object from design time metadata and control metadata

properties.name: annotations
properties.description: Annotations object from design time metadata

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label from getLabel property of design time metadata

properties.name: links
properties.description: Links from design time metadata

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Selection
symbols.description: Provides functionality to get and set selection on controls.

events.name: change
events.description: Attached listeners are notified of any modifications to existing selection.

methods.name: add

returnValue.description: true if the selection has changed

parameters.name: vControlIds
parameters.description: Control IDs to be selected

methods.description: Adds the specified controls to the current selection.

methods.name: get

returnValue.description: Selected control IDs

methods.description: Gets list of currently selected controls.

methods.name: remove

returnValue.description: true if the selection has changed

parameters.name: vControlIds
parameters.description: Control IDs from which to remove the selection

methods.description: Removes the selection from the specified controls.

methods.name: reset

returnValue.description: true if completed successfully (false if there is nothing to reset)

methods.description: Resets the current selection.

methods.name: set

returnValue.description: true if the selection has changed

parameters.name: vControlIds
parameters.description: Control IDs to be selected

methods.description: Deselects the current selection and selects the specified list of controls.

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.util.changeVisualization.ChangeIndicator
symbols.description: Constructor for a new sap.ui.rta.util.changeVisualization.ChangeIndicator class. The ChangeIndicator class is used to visualize the changes of an app.

properties.name: changes
properties.description: List of changes that should be rendered for the indicator

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Mode of the indicator, "change" or "dependent"

properties.name: posX
properties.description: Distance from the left side of the screen in px

properties.name: posY
properties.description: Distance from the top of the screen in px

properties.name: overlayId
properties.description: ID of the overlay that the indicator should be rendered in

properties.name: selectorId
properties.description: ID of the selector that the indicator's changes belong to

events.name: selectChange
events.description: Fired when the details for a change should be displayed

events.name: keyPress
events.description: Fired when a key is pressed while the focus is on the indicator

constructor.description: Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

events.name: keyPress
events.description: Fired when a key is pressed while the focus is on the indicator

events.name: selectChange
events.description: Fired when the details for a change should be displayed

methods.name: attachKeyPress

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oData
parameters.description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.ui.rta.util.changeVisualization.ChangeIndicator itself

methods.description: Attaches event handler fnFunction to the {@link #event:keyPress keyPress} event of this sap.ui.rta.util.changeVisualization.ChangeIndicator. When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.ui.rta.util.changeVisualization.ChangeIndicator itself. Fired when a key is pressed while the focus is on the indicator
